1332.content:
Just by the soft tone of the fox's, or more correctly the vixen's voice, you could tell she was a female. As your eyes quickly look downwards, you manage to spot two large furred mounds adorned on her huge chest, no doubt proving your guess as correct. Just as you were about to further examine her feminine form, your mind suddenly snaps back to more important matters as you gaze back at her huge eyes. "I-I'm...I'm a human." you stammer, unsure if she would think of you as a friend or a simple snack.

"A hooman?" The massive anthro repeats with a cocked head. "What's a hooman?"

The sudden question just left you completely stupefied. Did this strange place even know what a human being was? "err...well, a human being is kind of like you." you begin to explain while keeping an eye on her confused face. "though, we don't have heads, fur, or tails like yours." While it was quite a challenge explaining just what a human being was, especially considering she carried many traces of one, it seems like your simple description manages to work.

"So...a hooman is something like an anthro? except no fur and strange head?" She repeats, to which you immediately nod your head in response.

"y-yeah!" you reply with a small smile on your face. Maybe now she won't think of harming you, seeing just how similar your species were like. Just as relief was sweeping across your body, you suddenly realize her massive snout closing in straight towards you. "h-hey, what are you doing!?" you ask utterly shocked, as you try to move your body as far back from within her grip as possible. Soon, her huge black nose was a mere foot before you as it began to inhale and exhale at a rapid pace. Her quick breathing did manage to shake your hair all about, as you quickly realize she was sniffing your small form. After a few seconds of being bombarded by the warm gusts from her nostrils, she soon pulls her head back to gaze down at you once more.

You sigh in relief as the vixen smiles gently. You don't read any hostility in her expression.

"Well... You small funny, hooman," she says, "and you look kind of funny too. But... To be honest, you're kinda cute. Or--wait, do you not like being called cute? I guess some people might find that insulting."

You want to shrug to show you don't care either way, but you can't make any gestures, seeing as your entire body is encased in this giant creature's furry fist. So you just speak up again.

"It's fine," you say. "I'm just glad you don't want to hurt me."

"Oh, I'd never hurt something that can talk," the Anthro said. "That's where I draw the line."

You nod. That's good to know. In fact, the knowledge that this giant creature is holding you in her grasp but means you no harm makes you feel very glad. In her fist, you're safe. And you like that.

Even so, there is still the problem of your sudden teleportation to this weird forest. The existence of this giant anthropomorphic fox girl and her lack of knowledge about humans makes you think you're not even on Earth anymore. And although you like the idea of a giant creature caring for and protecting you, you wish you could go home nonetheless.

You consider asking the vixen if she knows anything about how you might have been teleported. Maybe there's magic here, and you don't know it. Alternatively, you can just roll with it and talk with this big friendly giantess...

"Sassshhh don't bea scared little one." You noticed she was helping you but; you unaware that she was using a spell to fix your vision. She then spoke an odd draconic of sorts and then out of the blue; your vision returned to normal and follow by the headache goes away.

You noticed her outfit oddly it looked
134.title: giant dragon Anthro!

135.content: You squint your eyes in an attemp to make out what is coming an you. The image before you becomes a...
135.title: Other

1351.content:
As you squint your eyes skywards, a sudden yelp of surprise manages to escape you. As hard as it was to swallow, what seemed to be a ginormous humanoid wolfess was standing right before you. The sheer size of her could easily match that of a building within the cities. Heck, she even looks capable of using a three story house as her own personal seat. Her whole body was decorated in a mix greyish, brown and white fur, giving her a close resemblance to that of a Timber wolf. Unlike a normal Timber wolf however, her body appeared to be very humanoid in shape with the exception of her almost paw like feet and four digit hands. Upon the top of her head streamed down a set of rather long grey hair that trailed down all the way to the start of her tail.

As your eyes were glued to the very form of the mysterious creature, it wasn't long until you realized her pure gold eyes were gazing straight down at you. Standing perfectly still in place, you feel your legs surrender to fright as they wiggle uncontrollably. Even if you did manage to have control of your feet, you doubt you'd be able to outrun this massive lupine. After a second or two of staring at one another, you soon watch as she begins to kneel her way downwards. It wasn't too long until she was down on all fours with her ginormous face mere yards before you. Even from your distance, the wafts of her hot breath manage to rush past your frozen form.

As silence emanated about the area, it was soon broken by the sound of a stern yet obviously feminine voice. "Human?" To your absolute disbelief, the wolfess seemed capable of speaking English.

"W-wha?" you stutter taken aback by the sudden voice.

"Human?" The wolfess asks once again as her right brow raises in place. "You...are Human?" Judging by the odd pauses in her speech, it seemed like English wasn't exactly her first language.

After minutes of hesitation, you slowly nod your head in response. "Y-yes." you answer. "I'm a human." The wolfess simply continues to stare at you as you notice her starting to cock her head to the side.

"Why here?..." She asks, obviously curious and confused about your presence within this part of the forest.

"E-ermm...I was just walking." You reply back, unsure just how to explain your casual stroll through the woods. Your answer seemed to have taken her aback as her golden orbs begin to widen.

"Walking?" She asks once more with the dumbfounded expression still on her face. "Y-Yes." you answer. "I was just walking about this forest. that's all."

Your reply oddly seems to have driven the gears in her mind as she cocks her head once more to the left. "You have clan?" "N-No." you shake your head while slowly raising your hands up in a defensive manner. "No one else is with me, I'm all by myself." Now that you thought about it, actually admitting you were alone could've been a bad move. You had no idea whether this wolf girl was a friend or foe, let alone if she had any plans with you at the start. If you at least lied, maybe it would've been in your favor. But than again, a group of humans against a ginormous wolf? Not likely a fair fight.

The wolfess continues to stare at you briefly for a few nanoseconds before her eyes begin to calm. As you continue to stand your ground before her, you can't help but notice her snout contorting as-
1351.title: giant Wolf Anthro

1353.content: The shadow of the colossus is now upon you and you see that it's..."
1353.title: Other

choices: In the Back of Her Thong
13532.content:
The ground shakes and you look around to see the trees falling down. “What’s that?!” you yell. “An earthquake?!” Then you gasp because there’s a large hole in the ground that looks like it has four large bumps as well. You then see something slam down right in front of you. It was a big and aqua colored flat foot big enough to smash a garbage truck and it ended with four toes with bright pink-colored nails. The foot looked like it belonged to a pachyderm of some kind and had a golden ankle brace. You then look up and you’re in absolute shock at what had just stepped in front of you.

From the looks of it, it was a giant amazon warrior woman who was so not 50 times bigger than you. More like 500 times bigger than you. But not only that, the amazon warrior woman was a giant anthropomorphic hippopotamus who would weight a few tons had she been normal size. She had a colossal belly and a pair of D-cup (in scale) breasts resting atop her belly bloat, but her ass was clearly the bigger part of her, being even wider as she was tall. She was wearing a black A-shirt and a red loincloth as well as golden bracelets, a gold necklace and dinosaur skulls for earrings. She also had long black hair reaching down to her tremendous rear. Her face was painted with gold warpaint of some kind and she had flower tattoos on her arms with large star-shaped tattoos on her massive butt cheeks. She had to be thousands of feet tall.  Then the hippo giantess let out a snort and turned her head to the ground.

You hide in her shadow because you don’t know if this hippo woman was hostile or not. She was absolutely titanic. The trees were more like grass to her as they only reached up to her ankles. You run under her legs to see her colossal butt looming over you. You saw that she appeared to be wearing a thong that had been swallowed almost completely by her rear and she had a belt with several bottles and a dagger attached. Suddenly the hippo’s butt shifts because she turns slightly and then spots you before giving an animalistic grunt.

You decide to try and run from the colossus, but then she picks you up between her enormous fingers as you yell. The hippo holds you up in front of her snout, her bright red painted lips in front of you as she snorts a gust of air that nearly blows you away from her enormous nostrils. Then the hippo smiles at you and then drops you as you yell and land inside one of the bottles she had in her belt. The hippo appears to chuckle to herself and is saying something but you couldn’t hear it from the bottle as she corked it. The bottle must’ve been sound proof.

 The hippo then decides to head off but not before she places the bottle with you inside of it right ...
13532.title: Of Hippopotami and Humongous Heights

14.content: What plants do you see?
14.title: Plant

choices: They ensnared you before you knew what happened.
141.content:
You look around trying to get some idea of where you are, maybe even find so landmark to help you find your way back home. Despite your best efforts you don't recognize anything even the plants look very different then the ones you know. Most notably was the clearing front of you was filled with flowers. Some of them were just foot or tall while others towered above you being over 15 feet tall by your estimate and every were in between.

You didn't even know flowers could even grow this big. Was this some sort of mutant strain of flowers? Having no where else to really go and wanting to see the flowers up close you walked into the field of flowers. As you walked through the field you took the time to examine them much clearer than you could at a distance and found that that their size wasn't the only thing strange about them. They had vibrant colors, some were closed up, others that were open kinda drooled some weird liquid with a tongue like appendage in the middle. Some of them were forked like snakes, others more nubby, long, human shaped ones, the list goes on of more exotic shapes and sizes.

They also had pretty big blubs in their stems and thicker but smooth petal tips. The more you looked at them the more you thought that you were dreaming. The is no way such things could exist. Little did you know that the plants were getting ready to strike.

The plants lunged at you and ....
141.title: Licking lilies ( lickys )

choices: something else finds you and you run into it.

142.title: An shape-shifting plant

15.content: As the beast draws closer; you realize that the animal is quite large. Or maybe you had somehow become smaller during your nap. Now that the animal is directly infront of you, you can tell that it is a...
15.title: The animal part 2

choices: The eagle takes you away to her nest
The eagle eats you on the spot
15112.content: You see a majestic bald eagle land infront of you. Scared out of your mind you wrap yourself in a fetal and try to hide. The eagle is clearly not fooled by this."Human!" The massive bird speaks, her words seemed to echo because of how small you are. "Why did you come here when you are so vulnerable. Why, any thing can just come along and eat you." The eagle seems to be nagging you as if she were your mother. "You could easly be swooped up and swallowed. Your skin sliding down their throat..." She seemed to start salivating, as if she though that the idea of eating you would be a great idea for lunch. The thought of being food for an eagle frightens you. And you don't know what she will do next.
15112.title: Eagle

choices: You missed a spot and she hungry for human.
She will let her mate decide as he lands on the other side of the nest
151121.content:
Her talons strike out and quickly grab you as she takes to the air. “W...w...where are you taking me?” You yell so she can hear you. The wind whips at your body as she flies though the air. “I’m taking you to my nest. As much as I’d love to eat such a rare treat you are, I have a proposition for you.” Is all she answered back. You don’t know if you like the sound of that.

You watch as she approaches the nest and drops you near the center. You land on the sticks making up the nest and roll into a sitting position. As you started to stand, the nest jostled as she landed on its edge. You tumble backwards into a hard surface. Turning you see an egg that’s twice your size. It’s warm which must mean her mate just left as she came back. Turning to face your captor you see she is thinking as she stares at you.

“If you don’t want to be my next meal, you will clean up this nest. I want my babies to hatch in a clean nest. Do a good job and I’ll keep you as a pet. Do a bad one and well i don’t think I need to tell you what will happen.” She narrows her eyes as she ends her talk. You gulp as she stares at you. Running over to a pile of bones and feathers you started to throw the stuff over the edge of the nest. It takes a while and you save the last feather to wipe off the eggs too just to be safe. There are three eggs in total so it doesn’t take long to finish. You collapse against one the eggs as you finish and look up at the eagle for assessment.

She looks at every detail closely and decided that...
151121.title: The eagle takes you away to her nest

choices: A baby eagle in her egg
You are being given to another animal as a present
1511212.content:
“You missed a spot. I told you to make sure the nest was clean. Look behind the eggs. There is still a few bones back there.” She squawked at you. Nervously you run behind the eggs and see what she’s talking about. There were 2 bones, but they where stuck under on of the eggs. Peaking around the egg you look at her narrowed eyes as they sized you up. “They are stuck under the egg. I can’t pull them out. If you move the egg slightly, I will grab them and finish cleaning. Please don’t eat me!” You pleaded, but her eyes narrowed more. “As I was going to offer protection, food, shelter, and an easy life for you. I would expect my “pets” to be able to figure things out on their own. You have proved to be just like any bug your size. I thought with your human intelligence you’d make a great pet.”

She stepped into the nest and the resulting tremor had You tumbling into the middle of the eggs. One clawed talon gently rolled the eggs apart and revealed you to her gaze. “I thought I could brag how I captured and tamed a human. The very species that is destroying our habitats and hunting some animals to extinction, but I guess I was wrong.” You had no time to move as she plucked you up in her beak. You tried to squirm free but you knew it was useless. In one fluid motion, you’re tossed into the air and snapped up into her beak. “No!” Is all you scream out, as her tongue laps at your body, as she tasted you. The noises that echoed around you, tell you she is very much enjoying the taste. “ please give me another chance! I’ll do better! Please don...” Your cries are cut off as she tilts her head up and with a loud “Gulp” you are swallowed. The only evidence of you is the small wiggling bulge moving on the outside as your squeezed thought the muscles till you disappeared into her stomach.

Dropping into her stomach, you become submerged in the lake of liquids. Sputtering as you surfaced and wiping your eyes you notice it’s pitch black. Swimming till you find a wall, you started to bang on it and scream. “Please let me out! I’ll do better! I don’t want to be eaten!” She moves and your sloshed around it the stomach. Once she stops moving her voice is muffled as she responds. “If you survive you’ll get your second chance.” And she giggles. The stomach becomes hotter and soon you pass out from the heat.

When you wake up you are...
1511212.title: You missed a spot and she hungry for human.

151122.content:
You slowly back away as she stares at you while drooling a bit. “Where are you going?” She says sweetly. “I only was to ta... help you.” She quickly corrects herself. Nervous you answer back. “Th.. th... thank you, ma’am. That’s Uh... nice of you, but I think I might be going now.” You turn and bolt when you hear he stomach growl.

You only get a few steps when your lifted by the back of your shirt and tossed into the air. You scream as you come down and into her open beak. It snaps shut on the top half of your body, leaving you bottom half kicking outside. Her tongue tastes you as you struggle to free yourself. After a few licks to the face and chest, bucks her beak, and brings you all the way into her beak. She seems to savor your flavor as she tosses you around a bit.

“Umm.. so good!” She says as she tastes you. “I’ve always wanted to try human.” “Please don’t eat me!” You cry out. You don’t want to die as bird food. She giggles as she replies. “But I still haven’t felt you skin sliding down my throat. I have to return to my mate and nest now so.... have fun.” “No! No! No! Don’t swal...” you where cut off as she tilts her head back and gulps you down. “Ha ha. That tickles.” She says as you squirm down her throat. With out anything to grab, you slide down easily, till you free fall into her stomach. Surfacing you you sputter as you hear her voice around you. “You where the most tasty thing I’ve eaten. And your movement in my stomach feels so good. If given the chance I’d do it again.” She says as her stomach gets hotter and you soon pass out.

Opening your eyes, your surprised your alive, and you seem to be...
151122.title: The eagle eats you on the spot
